name: athletics

B1 UK (US track and field) the general name for a particular group of sports in which people compete, including running, jumping, and throwing: an athletics team/club/meeting
US sports and physical activities of any type: Girls who participate in high school athletics are more likely to graduate than those who don’t.
More examplesFewer examplesWoodford is the captain of the British athletics team.There was a big controversy over the use of drugs in athletics.She is a fine runner and a well-known figure in Scottish amateur athletics.We love to watch the Olympics - especially the athletics.When did you first get interested in athletics, and why did you specialize in long jump?
